comment.body:
Thank you ^^
For sure I will take a look at this idea. 
btw do you know why the read me button show and other times left a wall of text in the main page?

ty for the info i was wondering about that and trying to figure a way to do it automatically something like var res: str.slice (0,200) my coding skills are nonexistent. since the limit for the zlog its 15, using it keeps the Zlob more clean and easy to go through, for the visitor.
